title: On Children and Death
description: Based on a decade of working with dying children, this book aims to offer the families of dead and dying children the help they need to survive. Dr. Kuebler-Ross speaks directly to the fears, doubts, anger, confusion, and anguish of parents confronting the terminal illness or sudden death of a child. She also provides psychological insights into the emotional need of the terminally ill child.
